SELECT test1.TheDate AS DATE,YEAR(NOW()) - YEAR(test1.newdate) AS yearAgo, CASE WHEN test2.maxalarmcount IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE test2.maxalarmcount END AS maxalarmcount FROM
(SELECT ADDDATE(CURDATE(), INTERVAL @d DAY) AS TheDate,ADDDATE(CURDATE(), INTERVAL @d DAY) AS newdate, @d := @d - 1 DAY FROM t_power, (SELECT @d := 0) temp WHERE ADDDATE(CURDATE(), INTERVAL @d DAY) >= DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL - 1 MONTH) ) test1
(SELECT DATE_FORMAT(TheDate, '%Y-%m') AS TheDate,TheDate AS newdate FROM (SELECT ADDDATE( DATE_FORMAT( CURDATE(), CONCAT(YEAR(CURDATE()) + 1, '-%m-%d') ), INTERVAL @d MONTH ) AS TheDate, @d := @d - 1 MONTH FROM t_power, (SELECT @d := 0) temp) test WHERE YEAR(TheDate) <= YEAR(CURDATE()) AND YEAR(TheDate) >= YEAR(CURDATE()) - 2) test1
(SELECT DATE_FORMAT(TheDate, '%Y-%m') AS TheDate,TheDate AS newdate FROM (SELECT ADDDATE(CURDATE(), INTERVAL @d MONTH) AS TheDate, @d := @d - 1 MONTH FROM t_power, (SELECT @d := 0) temp) test LIMIT 0, 6) test1
LEFT JOIN (
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(t1.`addtime`, '%Y-%m-%d') AS DATE, COUNT(t1.`id`) AS maxalarmcount FROM t_dev_alarm t1 INNER JOIN t_device_sydl t2 ON t1.`deviceid` = t2.`id` AND t1.`moduleid` = 17 AND t2.`isdelete` = 0 INNER JOIN t_device_group_relation t3 ON t3.`deviceid` = t2.`id` AND t3.`isdelete` = 0 AND t3.`moduleid` = t1.`moduleid` INNER JOIN t_device_group t4 ON t4.`id` = t3.`groupid` AND t4.`isdelete` = 0 AND t4.`moduleid` = t1.`moduleid`
AND t4.`id`=#{groupid}
INNER JOIN t_user_dgroup_relation t5 ON t5.`devicegroupid` = t4.`id` AND t5.`isdelete` = 0 INNER JOIN t_user t6 ON t6.`id` = t5.`userid` AND t6.`isdelete` = 0 AND t6.`id` = #{userid} INNER JOIN t_dev_alarm_state t7 ON t7.`state_name` NOT LIKE '%电量%' AND t7.`id` = t1.`alarmstateid` AND t7.`type` = 1 AND t7.`module_id` = t1.`moduleid` GROUP BY MONTH(t1.`addtime`)
) test2
ON test1.TheDate = test2.DATE
ON test1.TheDate = DATE_FORMAT(test2.DATE, '%Y-%m')
ON test1.TheDate = DATE_FORMAT(test2.DATE, '%Y-%m')
